name: ConformanceAdminService
title: Conformance Admin Service
publisher: HL7 International / Community Based Collaborative Care

contact.name: HL7 International / Community Based Collaborative Care

statement.label: requirement-496
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL support Subscription read

statement.label: requirement-497
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL support Subscription write

statement.label: requirement-498
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL support $status operation against Subscription resource

statement.label: requirement-499
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHOULD support Subscription topic discovery via the CapabilityStatement SubscriptionTopic Canonical extension

statement.label: requirement-500
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL support at least one Subscription channel type, and SHOULD include one from Subscriptions R5 Backport IG

statement.label: requirement-501
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL support at least one Subscription Payload Type

statement.label: requirement-502
statement.requirement:
Consent Administration Service SHALL conform to the BackportSubscriptionCapabilityStatementR4 CapabilityStatement

Expect this means include the same declarations in addition to including it in some way

statement.label: requirement-567
statement.requirement:
Consent Administration Service SHOULD NOT use cross version extensions on R4 subscriptions to describe any elements also described by this guide

Not exactly sure how to test this

statement.label: requirement-504
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHOULD declare conformance with the BackportSubscriptionCapabilityStatementR4 using CapabilityStatement.instantiates

statement.label: requirement-513
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL support Subscription resources that conform to BackportSubscription profile

statement.label: requirement-506
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL be able to read values in the backport-channel-type extension

statement.label: requirement-507
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL reject the subscription request if a client requests an unsupported channel via the backport-channel-type extension

statement.label: requirement-529
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL be able to read values in the backport-filter-criteria extension

statement.label: requirement-530
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL be able to apply filters as described by any Subscription Topics the server advertises support for

statement.label: requirement-531
statement.requirement:
Consent Administration Service SHALL reject the subscription request if any filters are unsupported

Will test with a variety of query strings that are not supported per the server's CapStmt.

statement.label: requirement-533
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL be able to read values in the backport-payload-content extension

statement.label: requirement-534
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL include information in notifications as described in this guide based on the value of the backport-payload-content extension

statement.label: requirement-535
statement.requirement:
Consent Administration Service SHALL reject the subscription request if a client asks for a content level the server does not intend to support (e.g., does not meet security requirements)

This cannot be fully tested for a given system unless we know its specific requirements, but we can hit it with each content level as an exploratory test.

statement.label: requirement-563
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL be able to generate a valid and correct R4 Backported R5 SubscriptionStatus resource for each notification

statement.label: requirement-538
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL be able to read values in Subscription.criteria for subscription topics referenced by it

statement.label: requirement-539
statement.requirement: Consent Administration Service SHALL reject the subscription request if it does not support a requested topic or will not honor the subscription otherwise
